title: Make homepage hero food imagery more colorful while preserving the existing site color scheme

requirements.text: Replace the homepage hero image with an updated version where only the food items (e.g., chicken and other foods) are more colorful and premium-looking, while keeping the website’s existing overall color scheme unchanged.

quotes: make the intro picture colourful means the chicken and all foods colour ful and give my website a premium look only Change the colour of food not the website keep website the colour as it was.

acceptanceCriteria: Home page continues to render a hero image in the right-side media panel.
The hero image file used by the Home page is updated to the newly generated/edited asset in /assets/generated.
Only the food items in the hero image appear more vibrant/premium; the rest of the website theme/colors remain unchanged (no changes to Tailwind theme variables or global site color styling).

constraints: Do not change the website’s existing overall color scheme; only adjust the colors of the food items in the homepage intro/hero picture.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
nonGoals: Creating a new admin dashboard (admin dashboard and product management already exist).
Changing global typography, Tailwind theme variables, or site-wide color tokens.

edits: Increase vibrance/saturation and premium lighting/contrast on the food items only; keep background and overall palette unchanged (hanma-hero.dim_1600x600.png > hanma-hero-colorful.dim_1600x600.png)

preferencesToAdd: User prefers a premium look while preserving the existing site color scheme; only food imagery should be made more colorful.
